inputs.text:
Tech at Wonga

Wonga is a fully online system meaning our engineering team is at the heart of what we do - we expect our engineers to be involved in every step of the development lifecycle from working with a Product Owner to delivering and maintaining their code in production.

What is the role?

As a senior engineer at Wonga itâ€™s your responsibility to drive the forward thinking approach we are striving to build in our teams, being engaged and showing initiative in all parts of the development lifecycle.

You will need to have the technical ability to get involved with, and lead day to day development, influence the direction of our technology and coach those around you whilst being open to and self-motivating in growing your own skill set. Passion, initiative and collaboration are the most important attributes we are looking for in colleagues to help us build an engineering team based around our core values.
